General.Name: Ahmad Zaki Resources Bhd
General.Description: Ahmad Zaki Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in engineering and construction business in Malaysia. The company operates in five segments: Engineering and Construction, Concession, Oil and Gas, Plantation, and Property. It undertakes civil and structured construction works, including commercial buildings, infrastructure works, educational institutions, public buildings and amenities, and sport facilities. In addition, the company operates as a dealer of marine fuels, lubricants, vessel, and power equipment related services. Further, the company engages in property development, hotel operation, facilities management activities, as well as operates highways. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Ahmad Zaki Resources Berhad is a subsidiary of Zaki Holdings (M) Sdn Bhd.
